testcase.name: test_question_7_comedy_death

failure.message: AssertionError: Expected at least 2 of ['Harold and Maude', 'Knives Out', '50/50', 'An Anand', 'Young Frankenstein']. Got: "Harold and Maude" (1971) is a comedy movie that involves death or dead people. assert 1 >= 2
